contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we might assist you
contact.title: Let's connect
footer.subText: All Rights Reserved. Designed and developed by
index.contactDescription: Does your building have a Legionella problem? Do you think we can do something for you or would you like more information, feel free to contact us for an exploratory talk. Every question will be treated confidentially.
index.subtitle: With a unique sustainable method, without adding chemicals to your drinking water
index.title: Controlling Legionella in tapwater
product.description: We are working on an innovative hot water controller, which will allow you to reduce the energy use, cost and infection risk during production, storage and distribution of your domestic hot water. This is possible by lowering the domestic hot water production temperature, while keeping the Legionella pneumophila risk under control with the heat shock regime.
product.title: More info coming soon
seo.contactDescription: Contact LoWatter and ask for more information
services.description: LoWatter provides case specific knowledge through consultancy on either disinfection or energy savings with a Legionella pneumophila predicting simulation model in order to lower the energy use, cost and infection risk during production, storage and distribution of domestic hot water.
services.title: More info coming soon

thanks.subtitle: We'll be in touch soon
thanks.title: Thanks!
